content.en: Image enhancement: Researchers have been investigating the effectiveness of various algorithms in improving the quality of medical images such as X-rays and CT scans. These algorithms aim to enhance image contrast, reduce noise, remove artifacts, and improve overall image quality. They utilize techniques such as wavelet transforms, adaptive thresholding, and multiwavelet-based analysis to achieve these improvements.
content.da: Billedforbedring: Forskere har undersøgt effektiviteten af forskellige algoritmer til at forbedre kvaliteten af medicinske billeder såsom røntgenbilleder og CT-scanninger. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre billedkontrasten, reducere støj, fjerne artefakter og forbedre den samlede billedkvalitet. De anvender teknikker som wavelet-transformationer, adaptiv tærskling og multiwavelet-baseret analyse for at opnå disse forbedringer.
